item.title: Need help with specs
item.dc:creator: @Bradyfan Bradyfan
item.description:
@Bradyfan wrote:

Okay so heres the thing,

I have specs for like everything on my server… However since no one can obtain the G Maul i want to make it

have unlimited specs…

Okay so i heard a lot of things about files but the one that a mod wanted was this:

}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 50) {
ProjectileSpec(340, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
calculateSpecial();
maulSpec();
usingSpecial = false;
specialDamage = 0;
specia

i dont know if thats exactly everything but yeah

the mod never replied back to my post =/ so yeah and if there are tuts on this could u please tell me the link? thanks!

But just a reminder im mainly trying to get these:

Unlimited Spec (the main objective)
Admin+ item

I really need this because my server seems to be popular and with spec updates it may be favored more =D
